p: A higher F-value signifies a well-fitting of the RSM model to the experimental data [41]. According to [42], an F-value along with low p-value indicates a high significance of the regression model. Nevertheless, the p-value should be lower than 0.05 for the model to be statistically significant [43]. Based on these reports, the regression model found in Table 4 was highly significant, as it is evident by the F-value = 5.50 and the low p-values = 0.0221, respectively.
